name: Evidently AI
headline: Open-source monitoring for machine learning models
description: We are building an open-source standard to monitor ML models in production. The tool is used by enterprise data science teams to operate their models reliably and detect and resolve issues.

founders.name: Elena Samuylova, Founder
founders.description:
- CEO and Co-founder Evidently AI
- Spent 7 years helping large enterprises deploy ML systems
- Previously built an industrial AI startup focused on steel and chemical markets
- Led business development for an enterprise ML division at Yandex (NASDAQ:YNDX)

founders.name: Emeli Dral, Founder
founders.description:
- CTO and Co-founder Evidently AI
- Co-author of the most popular Coursera course on ML in the Russian language with 100K+ students
- 50+ real-world ML projects from e-commerce to manufacturing 
- Ex-Chief Data Scientist at Yandex Data Factory, enterprise ML division at Yandex

# **Collaborative****AI observability****platform**
Evaluate, test, and monitor your AI-powered products.
[Get started](https://evidentlyai.com/</register>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6635b8bd836172caa86e1ebb_chat-text_red.svg)

###### open source
## **Powered by the leading ‍****open-source ML monitoring****library**
Our platform is built on top of Evidently, a trusted open-source ML monitoring tool. With 100+ metrics readily available, it is transparent and easy to extend.
[Learn more![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/660ef16a9e0687d9cc27473e_Group%209.svg)](https://evidentlyai.com/</evidently-oss>)
5500+
GitHub stars
25m+
Downloads
2500+
Community members
###### Components
## AI quality toolkit from development to production
Start with ad hoc tests on sample data. Transition to monitoring once the AI product is live. All within one tool. 
![Evidently AI Reports](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6633e8f7258f9e381d5e0b96_evaluate.png)
#### Evaluate
Get ready-made reports to compare models, segments, and datasets side-by-side.
![Evidently AI Tests](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6633e912a051205ffbe28c7b_test.png)
#### Test
Run systematic checks to detect regressions, stress-test models, or validate during CI/CD.
![Evidently AI Monitoring dashboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6633e9085ca892458af165e4_monitor.png)
#### Monitor
Monitor production data and run continuous testing. Get alerts with rich context.
###### GEN AI
## LLM observability
Gain visibility into any AI-powered applications, including chatbots, RAGs, and complex AI assistants. 
[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/660ef16a9e0687d9cc274741_Group%2012.svg)Customizable dashboardsGet a clear view of your AI product performance before and after deployment. Easily share findings with your team. ](https://evidentlyai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6635b934ae1ef0b5bb85613c_shield-check_white.svg)Continuous testingEvaluate generated outputs for accuracy, safety, and quality. Set criteria and test conditions specific to your use case. ](https://evidentlyai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6635b93535b1476b4740c0b6_gauge_white.svg)In-depth debugging Drill down to understand individual errors. Turn bad completions into test cases to continuously improve your application. ](https://evidentlyai.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)

Custom evals with any prompt, model, or rule
###### LLM EVALS
## Track what matters to your AI product
Easily design your own AI quality system. Use the library of 100+ in-built metrics, or add custom ones. Combine rules, classifiers, and LLM-based evaluations. 
[Learn more![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/660ef16a9e0687d9cc27473e_Group%209.svg)](https://evidentlyai.com/</llm-observability>)
###### Predictive ML
## ML observability
Evaluate input and output quality for predictive tasks, including classification, regression, ranking and recommendations.
[Data drift](https://evidentlyai.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[Data quality](https://evidentlyai.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)[ML performance](https://evidentlyai.com/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)
## Data drift
No model lasts forever. Detect shifts in model inputs and outputs to get ahead of issues. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Get early warnings on model decay without labeled data. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Understand changes in the environment and feature distributions over time. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Monitor for changes in text, tabular data and embeddings.
[Learn more![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/660ef16a9e0687d9cc274747_Group%2023.svg)](https://evidentlyai.com/</ml-monitoring>)
![Evidently AI Data drift](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/663529582077cc1b0065eeeb_data_drift.png)
## Data quality 
Great models run on great data. Stay on top of data quality across the ML lifecycle. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Automatically profile and visualize your datasets. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Spot nulls, duplicates, unexpected values and range violations in production pipelines. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Inspect and fix issues before they impact the model performance and downstream process. 
[Learn more![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/660ef16a9e0687d9cc274747_Group%2023.svg)](https://evidentlyai.com/</ml-monitoring>)
![Evidently AI Data quality](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6635297adf952e658c27e4ba_data_quality.png)
## Model performance
Track model quality for classification, regression, ranking, recommender systems and more.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Get out-of-the-box performance overview with rich visuals. Grasp trends and catch deviations easily. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Ensure the models comply with your expectations when you deploy, retrain and update them.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6621380c5a4fc308c069f93c_iconmonstr-checkbox-22_rose.svg)
Find the root cause of quality drops. Go beyond aggregates to see why model fails.
[Learn more![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/660ef16a9e0687d9cc274747_Group%2023.svg)](https://evidentlyai.com/</ml-monitoring>)
![Evidently AI ML Model performance](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6635299a24cd1b674bf4b2dc_model_performance.png)
###### testimonials
## Loved by community
Evidently is used in 1000s of companies, from startups to enterprise. 
![Dayle Fernandes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/6614093e3e6f9e9f13329f44_dayle%20fernandes.jpeg)
**Dayle Fernandes**
MLOps Engineer, DeepL
"We use Evidently daily to test data quality and monitor production data drift. It takes away a lot of headache of building monitoring suites, so we can focus on how to react to monitoring results. Evidently is a very well-built and polished tool. It is like a Swiss army knife we use more often than expected."
![Iaroslav Polianskii](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/66914c75db1dad61eeea44b4_Iaroslav%20Polianskii.jpeg)

Senior Data Scientist, Wise

##### **Egor Kraev**
Head of AI, Wise
"At Wise, Evidently proved to be a great solution for monitoring data distribution in our production environment and linking model performance metrics directly to training data. Its wide range of functionality, user-friendly visualization, and detailed documentation make Evidently a flexible and effective tool for our work. These features allow us to maintain robust model performance and make informed decisions about our machine learning systems."
![Demetris Papadopoulos](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/66742ae93ed3081fa3c95db0_demetris.jpeg)

Director of Engineering, Martech, Flo Health
"Evidently is a neat and easy to use product. My team built and owns the business' ML platform, and Evidently has been one of our choices for its composition. Our model performance monitoring module with Evidently at its core allows us to keep an eye on our productionized models and act early."
![Moe Antar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/66140a05d5148746ac2bac7f_Moe%20Antar.png)
##### **Moe Antar**
Senior Data Engineer, PlushCare
"We use Evidently to continuously monitor our business-critical ML models at all stages of the ML lifecycle. It has become an invaluable tool, enabling us to flag model drift and data quality issues directly from our CI/CD and model monitoring DAGs. We can proactively address potential issues before they impact our end users."
![Jonathan Bown](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/660ef16a9e0687d9cc2746d7/66140ba20007e5bec99f8b36_jonathan_bown.jpeg)

MLOps Engineer, Western Governors University
"The user experience of our MLOps platform has been greatly enhanced by integrating Evidently alongside MLflow. Evidently's preset tests and metrics expedited the provisioning of our infrastructure with the tools for monitoring models in production. Evidently enhanced the flexibility of our platform for data scientists to further customize tests, metrics, and reports to meet their unique requirements."

ML Infrastructure Engineer, Plaid
"We use Evidently for continuous model monitoring, comparing daily inference logs to corresponding days from the previous week and against initial training data. Evidently’s comprehensive suite of tests has proven invaluable, greatly improving our model reliability and operational efficiency."

[Join our Discord community](https://evidentlyai.com/<https:/discord.com/invite/PyAJuUD5mB>)

generated_description:
**Evidently AI: Open-Source Machine Learning Monitoring**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S21, Evidently AI is a small but mighty company based in San Francisco, focused on creating open-source tools for monitoring machine learning (ML) models. The mission? To establish a standard that helps enterprises manage their ML models in production reliably.

### What They Do
Evidently AI developed a comprehensive platform that allows data science teams to monitor key performance indicators of their ML models. This includes tracking data drift, validating data quality, and ensuring that models perform as expected in real-world conditions. They also emphasize community and collaboration—providing resources like tutorials, benchmarks, and a dedicated community for support.

Their core product offerings include:
- **LLM Observability**: Tools for monitoring large language models in various applications from chatbots to AI assistants.
- **ML Observability**: A system for overseeing data quality and model performance in predictive tasks.
- **Open-Source Library**: Their library has over 25 million downloads, reflecting a robust community engagement and usability.

### The Team
Evidently AI operates with a lean team of just two employees. This small structure allows for agility and a focused approach to product development. Nicolas Dessaigne, a notable figure in the tech community, serves as a Group Partner.

### Role in the AI Ecosystem
As a developer tool, Evidently AI stands out by not just focusing on model creation but on maintaining model performance and reliability over time. Companies can leverage their offerings to preemptively spot issues and make informed decisions based on insights drawn from real-time data analysis.

### Community Impact
With thousands of companies—from fledgling startups to established enterprises—utilizing their tools, Evidently AI has become entrenched in the AI observability landscape. Users rave about its efficiency in monitoring model performance and data quality, calling it a "Swiss army knife" for ML.

In a tech environment that often emphasizes innovation at all costs, Evidently AI provides a refreshing reminder: Monitoring and quality assurance are just as crucial as the initial model building.

### Conclusion
In the ever-evolving world of AI, Evidently AI is carving out a niche by combining open-source accessibility with powerful monitoring capabilities, encouraging collaboration among engineers and fostering an active community. For those looking to ensure the integrity and performance of their ML models, Evidently AI is worth considering. You can explore their offerings further at [Evidently AI](https://evidentlyai.com).
